column1: Baby Barnaby's////We had brunch at Baby Bar any' sand were pleasantly surprised with the quality
column2: portions and savoriness of the food.  The orange juice was freshly squeezed and exceptionally tasty.  The meal was complemented by our server
column3: Scott.  He was attentive and pleasantly humorous
column4: adding immensely to atmosphere.  Commended highly!
